text: Cartoon Network is a Polish pay television channel aimed at children, which launched on 1 September 1998 as a localised feed of the American television network of the same name. The channel is owned by AT&T;'s WarnerMedia under its International division. == History == On 30 September 2002, the channel began airing in Hungary and Romania, thus sharing its video feed with those countries while adding two additional audio tracks in Hungarian and Romanian. On 1 March 2007, Cartoon Network Poland started broadcasting 24 hours a day. On 1 October 2008, a separate feed of Cartoon Network was created for Hungary and Romania, while the two additional audio tracks that were previously to the channel added in 2002 were moved there. Both feeds are transmitted from Warsaw. The channel also carried a Toonami programming block between 2002 and 2006. On 14 October 2015, Cartoon Network launched in HD.https://satkurier.pl/news/120688/cartoon-network-hd-rozpoczal-nadawanie-w- polsce.html On 1 September 2016, Cartoon Network Poland rebranded using Check It 4.0 package. On 4 June 2018 at 10PM, Cartoon Network Poland aired Cartoon Network Classics for the first time. ==See also== * Boomerang (CEE) ==References== ==External links== * Category:Cartoon Network Category:Turner Broadcasting System Poland Category:Television channels in Poland Category:Television channels and stations established in 1998 Category:Polish- language television stations
title: Cartoon Network (Polish TV channel)
